name: 100 card design templates UI kit
description:
Card is one of the popular modular UI patterns that work well across a variety of screens and window sizes. 

-----------------------------------------------------

Hope this pack of 100 card design templates to inspire your next design projects.

⭐︎ Auto-layout

⭐︎ customizable with text, colors, images, icons...

⭐︎ 50 vertical designs

⭐︎ 50 horizontal designs

-----------------------------------------------------

Hope you all enjoy and have fun with it! Thanks for downloading the file :) Please feel free to remix this with your own designs and add more explorations.


Please tag me if you would like to do a remix. Thank you ^_^!
